task.title: Posting a Prose.io Response Post
task.shortdesc: This is a description of how to create a Prose.io post.

step.cmd: Open Prose.io and select the correct folder.
Create a new file using the button on the right near the top of the page.
Use two hashtags for an h2.

substep.cmd: You can use other html elements as well.
You can make changes later and change the file name to record what changes you have made.

step.cmd: Check Github to make sure your formatting turned out correctly.
